protocol_name: 24 Hour Metabolic Response to LPS in Monocytes
protocol_name_html: 24 Hour Metabolic Response to LPS in Monocytes

materials.reagent_name: Pipettes and P1000 P200 P10 tips

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ii3q","text":"Stimulation media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5uq03","text":"Add 500 \u03bcl fetal bovine serum and 50 \u03bcl pen-strep to 4.45 ml RPMI, sterile filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8f29q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9vucg","text":"Cell-Tak coated XFp plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2sbk2","text":"Prepare Cell-Tak. Add Cell-Tak and sodium hydroxide to 0.1 M sodium bicarbonate so that each well will receive 0.56 \u03bcg Cell-Tak, and sodium hydroxide concentration will be 0.63 mM. Cell-Tak concentration varies by batch, so calculations for each new batch will need to be performed. Add 25 \u03bcl Cell-Tak solution to each well. Plate can be stored at room temperature (at least 20 minutes) until use (for a few hours). Plates can also be prepped prior to assay day by incubating plates in Cell-Tak (at least 20 minutes), then aspirating remaining solution, air drying, and storing at 4oC until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":582,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fd0i8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3uh19","text":"Monocytes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"59hpb","text":"Monocytes should be prepared as directed in the monocyte isolation protocol. Isolated monocytes should be diluted to a concentration of 3\u00d7106 cells \/ ml in prepared stimulation media prior to use in the assay. Use monocytes immediately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":140,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"48B2F3C0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672641,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Day 1 Materials to Prepare"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h2k5","text":"Aspirate Cell-Tak solution if not already done.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6DF38AF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672643,"previous_guid":"48B2F3C0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1epm0","text":"Add 50 \u03bcl medium to wells A and H and 50 \u03bcl cells to wells B-G. Samples are generally run in duplicate or triplicate on each plate. Cell number is 1.5\u00d7105 cells per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":153,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"78351F60CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672644,"previous_guid":"6DF38AF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3r8hn","text":"Place plate in the carrier and place in centrifuge. Spin 300\u00d7g for 1 minute without brake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":61,"length":1,"style":"italic"},{"offset":76,"length":13,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"7F53C8F0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672645,"previous_guid":"78351F60CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2at6c","text":"Add 130 \u03bcl stimulation medium to each well A-H (final volume 180 \u03bcl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"857574E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672647,"previous_guid":"7F53C8F0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cufjl","text":"Prepare LPS: 3 \u03bcl of 1 \u03bcg\/ml LPS in 297 \u03bcl stimulation medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8A7D7370CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672648,"previous_guid":"857574E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14js","text":"Add 20 \u03bcl media to wells A-D, H and 20 \u03bcl LPS dilution to wells E-G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8F977360CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672649,"previous_guid":"8A7D7370CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56rmg","text":"Incubate plate at 37oC\/5%CO2 incubator for 23 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":20,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":27,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"947F8DE0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672650,"previous_guid":"8F977360CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24bfm","text":"Turn on XFp analyzer to warm up overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"98694B30CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672651,"previous_guid":"947F8DE0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tc5","text":"Hydrate XFp sensor cartridge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b88vm","text":"    Add 200 \u03bcl XF calibration solution (included with FluxPak) to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1r7rl","text":"    Add 400 \u03bcl sterile PBS or H2O to each moat. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":31,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8vpmh","text":"    Incubate overnight at 37oC in non-CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":28,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":40,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"9BCFA7B0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672652,"previous_guid":"98694B30CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 1 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dj2l","text":"Seahorse DMEM Media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4kst7","text":"Add 50 \u03bcl pyruvate, 50 \u03bcl L-glutamine, 20 \u03bcl glucose to 5 ml Seahorse Base Medium. Sterile filter before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A57E4AF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672655,"previous_guid":"9BCFA7B0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Materials to Prepare"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ts6d","text":"Place plate in the carrier and place in centrifuge.Spin 300\u00d7g for 1 minute without brake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":60,"length":1,"style":"italic"},{"offset":75,"length":13,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B12DC740CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672656,"previous_guid":"A57E4AF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f61hj","text":"Aspirate supernatant and replace with 200 \u03bcl Seahorse DMEM medium ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B89F99E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":"672657","previous_guid":"B12DC740CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"913n5","text":"Incubate plate 1 hr at 37oC in non-CO2 incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":25,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":37,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"BBA5ADF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672658,"previous_guid":"B89F99E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dp8j0","text":"Remove sensor cartridge from incubator and remove and reinsert sensors briefly to clear air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C04303D0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672659,"previous_guid":"BBA5ADF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fovii","text":"Set up program on Seahorse XFp and calibrate sensor cartridge (remove lid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":63,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6jh6d","text":"   Basal: 6 measurements","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C3A9FC90CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672660,"previous_guid":"C04303D0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cogaa","text":"After 1 hour cell incubation, remove utility plate from XFp and insert cell plate (remove lid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":83,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C891A1E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672661,"previous_guid":"C3A9FC90CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b6p7","text":"Run Assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"CE8B7A80CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672662,"previous_guid":"C891A1E0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eljnc","text":"After run is completed, image each well by photomicroscopy or collect and isolate protein from each well to normalize cell numbers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D2CD9100CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672663,"previous_guid":"CE8B7A80CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"108qk","text":"Data are analyzed by mean ECAR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D7BA3F60CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672664,"previous_guid":"D2CD9100CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Data Analysis"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pdh3","text":"While plate is incubating, complete steps 16-17.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E19522C0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","id":672665,"previous_guid":"BBA5ADF0CB3611E894825900B4B4CF9A","section":"Day 2 Procedure"}
